name: Kote Foundation
briefDescription: Right to Live is a Kote Foundation initiative and our aim is to create a transparent healthcare network that enables financial donors, organizations, the corporate sector and the government to come together to raise funds for the common goal of saving the lives of the underprivileged by providing critical on time medical assistance in the form of surgery, medicine, and consultation by leveraging the Internet.In past 6 months we have managed support 14 Individuals, and their families we look forward to reach out to more needy.
